Data: Toss and teams: Bangladesh have won the toss and they will bowl first.
Mortaza to Marsh, no run gets good bounce and carry outside off, Marsh does well to shoulder arms
Mortaza to Marsh, 3 runs nice way to get off the mark, Mortaza swings it into the pads and he tucks it away past square leg, the ball slows down close to the boundary
Mortaza to Hopes, no run hits a good length outside off and the ball climbs on him, he gets his elbows high and punches to point
Mortaza to Hopes, no run pitches around the off stump, he gets nicely behind the line and defends
Mortaza to Hopes, no run moves across his stumps and turns it down to midwicket, Hopes sets off but Marsh sends him back
Mortaza to Hopes, no run gets a bit of extra bounce and cramps Hopes for room as he tries to cut

Shahadat to Marsh, 4 leg byes not the best of starts for Shahadat, he doesn't control the movement into the left hander and strays onto his pads, the ball clips the base of the pad and rolls away to fine leg
Shahadat to Marsh, no run much better, fires in the inswinging yorker on off stump and Marsh taps it back to the bowler off the toe edge of the bat
Shahadat to Marsh, (no ball) he oversteps this time and the result isn't too good, he strays on the pads again and the ball clips the pad and beats the keeper
Shahadat to Marsh, no run Free Hit loops it outside the off stump and the ball lands on a yorker length outside off, he makes room but can only heave it down to midwicket
Shahadat to Marsh, no run Shahadat really grunts as he delivers that, lands on a good length outside off and Marsh pats it down to the bowler
Shahadat to Marsh, 1 run he lets out another Sharapova grunt as he delivers that one outside off, he opens the face of the bat and angles it just wide of point
Shahadat to Hopes, 1 run short of a length and straying towards the body, Hopes pulls but doesn't time it as well as he would've liked, he manages to place it wide of midwicket though
Mortaza to Hopes, no run pitches on a good length on off and middle, he pushes it back to the bowler
Mortaza to Hopes, 1 run gets a bit of bounce outside off, he gets his elbows high and cuts it down to third man who's quite square
Mortaza to Marsh, no run comes over the wicket to Marsh and nearly claims the wicket, it lands on off stumps and gets a bit of movement away, how did that miss the outside edge?
Mortaza to Marsh, no run away movement again but he lands this slightly wide outside off, Marsh safely lets it go
Mortaza to Marsh, no run almost a repeat of the previous ball, safely negotiated again by Marsh
Mortaza to Marsh, 2 runs pitches on middle stump and Marsh gets in position early to tuck it away past midwicket with the swing, not a bad over in the end
Shahadat to Hopes, 1 run Gets forward and pushes it in front of mid-on and calls for the run quickly, good running
Shahadat to Marsh, (no ball) 2 runs He oversteps again, pitches outside off and gets a lot of bounce, he hangs his bat out and uppishly places it wide of the vacant gully region
Shahadat to Marsh, no run Free Hit And again he fails to put it away, backs away to a full delivery and the ball just dips before reaching mid-on who's right at the edge of the circle
Shahadat to Marsh, 1 run gets forward and the inside edge nearly trickles onto the stumps, the ball rolls to fine leg

Shahadat to Hopes, FOUR runs shot! He bangs it in short of a length on middle and leg, Hopes picks the length early, swivels and pulls hard along the ground wide of square leg, that's the first boundary today off the bat
Shahadat to Hopes, no run left alone outside off

Shahadat to Hopes, FOUR runs bang! He bangs it in short again and Hopes repeats the earlier shot, he picks the length early and pulls it over midwicket, more elevation this time before reaching the boundary
Mortaza to Marsh, no run shoulders arms outside off
Mortaza to Marsh, no run gets good away movement, he gets on the front foot before letting it go
Mortaza to Marsh, no run just drifts wide outside off, he shoulders arms
Mortaza to Marsh, no run same result again, he angles it across the left hander and he lets it go
Mortaza to Marsh, no run pitches on a fullish length outside off, he shoulders arms
Mortaza to Marsh, no run hits a good length outside off, he lets this one go
Nazmul to Hopes, no run starts off with a good length delivery outside off, he pushes it to the off side
Nazmul to Hopes, no run Hopes is solid in defense as he gets forward to push it back to the bowler
Nazmul to Hopes, 1 run holds the length back outside off, Hopes is strong on the pull but it's only a single to fine leg
Nazmul to Marsh, 1 run taps it softly in front of mid-off and sets off quickly for the run, Shahadat has a shy at the stumps and hits but it's a little too late
Nazmul to Hopes, no run Hopes leans forward for a booming drive but mistimes it, the ball rolls on the pitch back to the bowler

Nazmul to Hopes, FOUR runs Hopes gets in position early to whip it over midwicket but he mistimes it a little and yet manages to beat the fielder, Hopes will latch onto anything drifting onto his body
Mortaza to Marsh, 1 run gets forward and taps it just wide of mid-off, a sliding save restricts that to a single
Mortaza to Hopes, 1 run pushes it down towards cover with very soft hands and calls quickly, good running
Mortaza to Marsh, 1 run another example of excellent running and calling from these two, Marsh goes on the back foot and taps it softly besides the vacant silly point region and calls immediately
Mortaza to Hopes, no run gets across his stumps and works it to the on side
Mortaza to Hopes, no run holds the length back outside off, he gets across his stumps and tries to set off for another quick single after pushing it towards mid-on, Marsh sends him back
Mortaza to Hopes, 2 runs gets forward and punches it off the full face of the bat past cover
Nazmul to Marsh, no run goes for a wild cut without moving his feet and gets a thick under edge through to the keeper
Nazmul to Marsh, no run much better, he gets behind the line this time as he pushes it down to mid-off
Nazmul to Marsh, no run slightly shorter in length outside off, he stays at the crease and punches it hard to short cover
Nazmul to Marsh, no run poor delivery but he gets away with it, full and wide outside off and deserving of a booming boundary but Marsh finds mid-off

Nazmul to Marsh, no run where did that come from?? Brilliant delivery from Nazmul, he really gets it to kick off a good length and that fizzes past Marsh's glove, that was equally well played as Marsh dropped his hands as the ball reared up on h
Nazmul to Marsh, no run fullish outside off and he pushes it hard across the line to mid-on
Mortaza to Hopes, 1 leg bye trickles off his pads and he sets off for a quick single, Mehrab runs forward from midwicket and has a shy at the stumps on the dive but he misses
Mortaza to Marsh, no run pitches outside off, Marsh watchfully lets it go
Mortaza to Marsh, no run hits a good length outside off, Marsh shoulders arms again
Mortaza to Marsh, no run superb line and length from Mortaza, it lands outside off and kicks up before reaching the keeper, well left by Marsh
Mortaza to Marsh, 1 run gives him a bit more width and Marsh gets in position early for the cut and slices it down to third man who's fielding very square
Mortaza to Hopes, no run gets behind the line and defends on the back foot
Nazmul to Marsh, 1 run gets forward to defend but manages a thick inside edge onto his pads, the ball rolls down towards leg gully
Nazmul to Hopes, 1 run slants it into the right hander, he gets across his stumps and works it with the angle to midwicket

Nazmul to Marsh, FOUR runs fullish outside off and angling it away, Marsh gets nicely behind the line and eases it on the front foot past extra cover, Razzak covers a lot of ground to get to it from deep point but makes a mess of it
Nazmul to Marsh, no run fullish and wide outside off, he mistimes the drive to short cover
Nazmul to Marsh, no run full and angling across the left hander, the crisply-timed drive finds mid-off
Nazmul to Marsh, no run full and swinging away from him, he shoulders arms this time
Mortaza to Hopes, no run just short of a length outside off, he gets his elbows high and punches it down to cover

Mortaza to Hopes, 1 run in the air but.. the first false shot from Hopes, he tries to loft over mid-off but ends up getting a top edge which falls between backward point and third man, cries of 'catch it' but Bangladesh aren't so lucky
Mortaza to Marsh, 1 run tucked away down to mid-on, a good save restricts that to a single
Mortaza to Hopes, no run hits a good length outside off, he gets behind the line and defends
Mortaza to Hopes, no run gets across his stumps, closes the face of the bat and tucks it wide of mid-on
Mortaza to Hopes, no run turns the face of the bat and works it with the angle down to square leg
Nazmul to Marsh, no run pitches outside off, not much bounce before reaching the keeper
Nazmul to Marsh, 1 run short and wide outside off and Marsh gives it the treatment with a fierce cut but there's protection at deep cover for that, Razzak mops up
Nazmul to Hopes, 1 run short of a length outside off and punched wide of cover

Nazmul to Marsh, 3 runs excellent fielding there, Marsh leans forward to drive through the off side but gets a thick inside edge past the stumps, Tamim gives the chase from short fine leg and just pulls it back before the rope, good commitment

Nazmul to Hopes, OUT Bangladesh strike, very poor stroke by Hopes, he tries to pull a short delivery but gets very early on the stroke, the top edge is taken easily by Mehrab at short midwicket, Hopes makes his way back as soon as he skies the
Nazmul to Clarke, no run bangs it in short, Clarke ducks under it
Mortaza to Marsh, 1 wide strays too wide outside off, left alone and wide called
Mortaza to Marsh, no run fullish and wide outside off, left alone
Mortaza to Marsh, no run Mashrafe induces a false shot by pitching it on the corridor outside off, Marsh hangs his bat out and nearly feathers an edge
Mortaza to Marsh, 1 run opens the face of the bat and steers it down to third man
Mortaza to Clarke, no run takes a good look at this one outside off and lets it go
Mortaza to Clarke, no run pitches outside off and holds its line, he lets this one go as well

Mortaza to Clarke, 1 run tucks it down towards square leg and there's a lot of hesitation in this single, Clarke stops, starts again and somehow makes it to the crease, the throw is just wide of the stumps
Nazmul to Clarke, no run signs of low bounce there, that bounces twice before reaching Ghosh
Nazmul to Clarke, no run better bounce this time, kicks up outside off and Clarke works it down to point
Nazmul to Clarke, no run angled towards middle and leg, he closes the face of the bat and pushes it with the line to midwicket
Nazmul to Clarke, no run pitches on a good length outside off, he gets behind the line and taps it down to the off side
Nazmul to Clarke, no run gets his elbows high and pushes it down to cover
Nazmul to Clarke, 1 run banged in short of a length and angling towards the body, Clarke pulls hard along the ground but finds Razzak at deep midwicket who's stationed there to limit the boundaries
Mortaza to Clarke, no run pitches outside off and moves away before reaching the keeper, he shoulders arms
Mortaza to Clarke, no run pitches outside off and gets it to angle across the right hander, he lets it go again
Mortaza to Clarke, no run angling towards the body, he shuffles and tucks it down to midwicket
Mortaza to Clarke, no run lands outside off and the away movement keeps a check on Clarke as he has to contend with another dot ball
Mortaza to Clarke, no run left alone, only this one's wider outside off and Clarke looks back to gauge the movement
Mortaza to Clarke, 1 run angled towards the body, he shuffles and tucks it behind square on the on side
Nazmul to Clarke, no run pitches outside off and cramps him for room, he gets behind the line and punches it off the back foot
Nazmul to Clarke, no run full on middle and leg, he pushes it down to mid-on and turns down any chance of a single
Nazmul to Clarke, no run full in length outside off but Clarke can't find the gap as he pushes it straight to cover

Nazmul to Clarke, no run holds the length back and that looked like a couple of runs the moment it left the bat, however an excellent save by Kapali at cover limited that to a dot ball, Ashraful was very pleased with the effort
Nazmul to Clarke, 1 run a cracker of a pull but it nearly costs Clarke his wicket as the ball dips and just falls short of Razzak at deep square leg
Nazmul to Marsh, 1 run slides towards the pads, he tucks it down to deep square
Shakib to Marsh, no run Appeal: Marsh looks to slog him across the line and both Shakib and Ghosh are convinced he's edged it, but umpire Saheba doesn't think so
Shakib to Marsh, 1 run flighted on off and middle, he works it down to deep square
Shakib to Clarke, no run comes round the wicket, he gets well forward and defends
Shakib to Clarke, no run not much turn, he stays on the back foot and taps it back to the bowler
Shakib to Clarke, no run the arm ball, he stays on the back foot and defends back to the bowler
Shakib to Clarke, no run flighted on off and middle, he stays at the crease and defends
Nazmul to Marsh, no run pitches it on off and middle, cramps him for room and he has to settle for a dot ball to cover
Nazmul to Marsh, 1 run slightly wide outside the off stump, he makes a bit of room and slices it wide of point
Nazmul to Clarke, no run firmly pushes a full delivery back to the bowler and Nazmul shows aggression by taking aim at the stumps, he misses by a mile
Nazmul to Clarke, no run gets a half stride forward and taps it down to cover, he's trying to break free

Nazmul to Clarke, FOUR runs Clarke cuts loose this time and he gets his timing and placement right, Nazmul errs by giving him width outside off, Clarke reaches out and carves it past backward point, no chance for third man to mop up
Nazmul to Clarke, 1 run shuffles across and tucks it softly down to mid-on, good calling and running
Shakib to Clarke, no run lunges forward and taps it down to point, thinks of a single but Marsh shoots down the idea
Shakib to Clarke, 1 run flighted outside off, he gets forward and pushes it to long-off
Shakib to Marsh, 1 run comes over the wicket to Marsh, he gets on his knee and sweeps to Razzak at deep square leg
Shakib to Clarke, no run steps down the track and pushes it to the on side
Shakib to Clarke, FOUR runs shot! That is fractionally short of a length outside off, Clarke stays on the back foot, waits for the turn and cuts wide of backward point

Shakib to Clarke, OUT Clarke gets a little cheeky with the cut and pays the price, Shakib doesn't give him enough room to work with outside off and the ball skids through quickly, he tries to dab it down to third man, takes the outside edge and
Shahadat to Marsh, no run grunts and dishes out a yorker, he digs it out to mid-off
Shahadat to Marsh, 1 run hits the deck hard and Marsh gets in position early for the pull, there's protection in the deep for that
Shahadat to Hussey, no run hits a good length outside off and shapes away, he shoulders arms
Shahadat to Hussey, no run full and wide outside off and punched very firmly to Kapali at short cover, he's had a good day in the field
Shahadat to Hussey, 1 run bangs it in short but he mistimes the pull to deep square
Shahadat to Marsh, 1 run tries out another short delivery and another pull is mistimed, this time it rolls off the glove to square leg
Shakib to Marsh, no run flighted on middle and leg, he steps down the track but the ball travels off the toe edge of the bat to the on side
Shakib to Marsh, 1 run works it with the angle behind square on the on side
Shakib to Hussey, 1 run drifts on the pads, he uses his wrists and works it down to fine leg
Shakib to Marsh, 1 run flighted down the leg side, he turns it to the on side
Shakib to Hussey, no run tossed up outside off, he lunges forward and pushes it towards cover
Shakib to Hussey, no run flighted outside off and defended back to the bowler
Shahadat to Marsh, no run short of a length, Marsh thinks of pulling it but changes his mind and defends back to the bowler on seeing the ball skid through

Shahadat to Marsh, 1 run pushed to midwicket, there's hesitation after Shakib picks it up one-handed and in one motion takes aim at the non striker's end, he misses, Shakib actually went for the wrong end
Shahadat to Hussey, 2 runs he pulls it hard down to square leg and Nazmul charges from fine leg and nearly over runs the ball, he manages to cut it off just before the rope
Shahadat to Hussey, 1 run shortish in length, he steers it wide of gully
Shahadat to Marsh, FOUR runs shot! That should make Marsh feel a lot better, it's short and drifting down leg, he pulls hard and fine leg had absolutely no chance
Shahadat to Marsh, 1 run full in length outside off and he drives inside out to the off side
Mortaza to Hussey, 2 runs full toss on off, Hussey drives it down the ground, Raqibul rushes in from long-off to prevent thes second but he fumbles and the batsmen take two
Mortaza to Hussey, 2 runs pulled to deep midwicket, straight away the call is for two
Mortaza to Hussey, 1 run hit to midwicket again but this time only a single
Mortaza to White, no run back of a length on off stump, White defends
Mortaza to White, 1 run similar length but drifting towards leg this time, White works it towards short midwicket, batsmen go for a tight single and take another on the overthrow
Mortaza to Hussey, 1 run played to wide long-off
Nazmul to Hussey, FOUR runs on a length just outside off, Hussey advances down the track and gives himself room and flays that to the point boundary
Nazmul to Hussey, FOUR runs consecutive boundaries, and superbly timed this time, full toss, Hussey backs away a little and hits it to the mid-off boundary
Nazmul to Hussey, 1 run backs away again to another full toss which is driven to long-off
Nazmul to White, 1 run yorker length delivery on middle, White digs it out to long-on
Nazmul to Hussey, SIX runs Hussey is going berserk here. Slower legspinner and Hussey comes down the pitch and scoops it straight back over the bowler for a six
Nazmul to Hussey, FOUR runs not a shot to remember this time but it fetches him four runs, inside edge trickles away very fine past the keeper's right as 20 runs come off the over
Shakib to Marsh, no run works it with th turn to short fine leg
Shakib to Marsh, 2 runs stays back at the crease, waits for the turn and angles it past short third man
Shakib to Marsh, no run stays at the crease and works it with the turn to midwicket
Shakib to Marsh, 1 run pushes it quicker, lands on a fulligh length and he works it down to long-on
Shakib to Hussey, no run lunges forward for a half hearted forward defense but the ball just beats the outside off
Shakib to Hussey, 1 run gets forward and pushes it down to cover
Shahadat to Hussey, no run hits a good length on off stump and cramps him for room, he taps it back to the bowler
Shahadat to Hussey, 1 run stays at the crease and taps it just wide of Ashraful at backward point, they pick up a quick single
Shahadat to Marsh, 2 runs holds the length back outside off and Marsh latches onto it with a pull, he gets enough elevation to clear mid-off but not enough timing to reach the boundary
Shahadat to Marsh, 1 run slower ball outside the off stump, he angles it down to third man
Shahadat to Hussey, no run gets forward and taps a good length delivery down to cover
Shahadat to Hussey, no run pitches on middle and leg, he gets behind the line and defends
Mortaza to White, 1 run given width to free his arms, White steps out and cuts it but only a single results
Mortaza to Hussey, (no ball) 1 run no-ball, that will be a free hit, Hussey drives it towards long-on
Mortaza to White, no run excellent delivery for the free hit, yorker on middle stump, not much that White could do with that, no run as his drive goes back to the bowler
Mortaza to White, 1 run dug out towards cover
Mortaza to Hussey, 1 run keeps it full on middle and all Hussey can do is flog it to long-on
Mortaza to White, no run this is turned out to be a fantastic over. another delivery spearing into middle. Dot ball.
Mortaza to White, 1 run Another yorker and no run again as White digs it out to cover
Shahadat to White, 3 runs overpitched and White crunches that towards deep midwicket. Superb running as they take three.
Shahadat to Hussey, 1 run driven to sweeper cover for a single
Shahadat to White, OUT that the end of Cameron White. Tries to steer it to third man exposing his stumps and the ball crashes into off stump
Shahadat to Johnson, OUT banged in short and Johnson's pull gets a top edge which balloons for a simple catch for the bowler
Shahadat to Hussey, 2 runs good ball, fullish just outside off, and Hussey powers it towards deep cover and they take two
Shahadat to Hussey, OUT three wickets in four balls for Shahadat! short of a length, Hussey advances down the pitch and tries to scoop it over cover but fails to connect and that hits his off stump
All you social networking freaks out there, add Cricinfo Widgets to your page today.
Be part of the Tony Greig Show. Send him an interesting question and if Tony fancies it, he will invite you to be on the show - send your question via the feedback page.

It been a good comeback by Bangladesh in the last 15 overs as just 101 runs came off it. Michael Clarke would have wanted more form his batsmen after that stand between Shaun Marsh and Michael Hussey had given them the perfect foundation but Australia
So Australia finish on 254, the same score they managed when these two sides last met here five years ago.
Nathan Bracken to start things off
Bracken to Tamim, no run Short and some width and Tamim Iqbal goes for an extravagant cut but misses
Bracken to Tamim, no run better delivery this time, he lets it go outside off
Bracken to Tamim, no run hit hard towards point but no run
Bracken to Tamim, no run back of a length, just outside off, Tamim gets on the front foot and tries to work it down the ground for a single
Bracken to Tamim, FOUR runs bit short and some width, Tamim lashes that over point, Brett Geeves makes a desperate dive at the boundary but that a four
Bracken to Tamim, no run defended on the front foot
Clark to Mehrab jnr, no run back of a length, defended
Clark to Mehrab jnr, no run bit of width and he lets it go through to the keeper
Clark to Mehrab jnr, no run on the legs this time, Mehrab flicks it towards midwicket, can't beat the infield
Clark to Mehrab jnr, no run well-directed bouncer, Mehrab is surprised but he ducks in time
Clark to Mehrab jnr, no run just down the leg side, Mehrab leaves it again
Clark to Mehrab jnr, no run bouncer on leg-stump line this time, Mehrab gets under it again
Bracken to Tamim, no run short of a length, in the corridor, good ball and Tamim shoulders arms
Bracken to Tamim, 2 runs again in the channel, Tamim tries to leave it but is late and the ball flies off the bat towards third man
Bracken to Tamim, no run
Bracken to Tamim, FOUR runs shorter ball on off stump, Tamim crashes that to midwicket for a boundary. He's an aggressive batsman, he won't be leaving too many deliveries
Bracken to Tamim, 2 runs on a length and tucked away off his pads, batsmen scramble through for two.
Bracken to Tamim, no run immaculate line and length from Bracken, Tamim, though, tries to slam it down the ground, goes straight back to the bowler
Clark to Mehrab jnr, no run defended towards cover. Mehrab is yet to get off the mark

Clark to Mehrab jnr, OUT Mehrab's gone! LBW. After feeding him a series of bouncers in the previous over, Clark pitches this one up and gets it to swing in to the left-hand batsman, raps his pads and he's gone
Clark to Ashraful, 1 wide short and very, very wide. Ashraful chases it but doesn't connect. First ball and he goes for an extravagant shot!
Clark to Ashraful, no run much better line, closer to off and Ashraful shoulders arms this time
Clark to Ashraful, no run short and wide again, and he's getting the move to move away from the right hander here
Clark to Ashraful, no run slightly wide outside off, let through to the keeper again
Clark to Ashraful, no run works it towards the off side with soft hands, but can't get a run.
Bracken to Tamim, 2 runs slight width, back of a length and Tamim flat bats it past the bowler for four
Bracken to Tamim, no run defended this time, much better line
Bracken to Tamim, no run slower delivery, good length, Tamim gets on the front foot and was a little early on the stroke but no harm done
Bracken to Tamim, FOUR runs another slower ball, and another down-the-ground four, that was uppish but evaded the fielder at mid-off
Bracken to Tamim, no run good length, on middle and off, defended by Tamim
Bracken to Tamim, no run short of length, in the channel, driven firmly to mid-off
Clark to Ashraful, 1 run slower delivery on leg stump, Ashraful plays it with soft hands, drops it in front of square on the leg side
Clark to Tamim, 1 wide short delivery and wide. Tamim has shown he doesn't need a second invite for the cut and he throws his bat at it again but doesn't connect
Clark to Tamim, no run shortish, outside off, fiercely hit again, can't beat the cover fielder though
Clark to Tamim, no run hit on the thigh pad, Ashraful wanted a single but Tamim was on his back foot
Clark to Tamim, 1 wide whistles down leg, pitched on leg stump and seams more down and tahts another wide
Clark to Tamim, 1 run hits it towards midwicket
Clark to Ashraful, no run Clark getting big movement off the seam, pitched on a length just outside off and jagged away from Ashraful
Clark to Ashraful, 1 run slower delivery, runs it down to third man
Johnson to Ashraful, no run appeal for a caught behind as Ashraful tries to pull a short delivery on leg stump but that came off his pad
Johnson to Ashraful, 1 wide similar delivery, Ashraful lets it go this time
Johnson to Ashraful, 1 run banged in short again, Ashraful pulls it behind square this time
Johnson to Tamim, no run short and outside off, Tamim attempts another flamboyant shot, and doesn't connect again
Johnson to Tamim, no run got to him quicker than he expected, inside edges it to square leg
Johnson to Tamim, no run A wristy flick to a full delivery on middle and leg
Johnson to Tamim, 1 run jumps and gets it behind point for a single
Clark to Tamim, no run gives it everything again but mistimes it and it goes to mid-on
Clark to Tamim, no run slower delivery, yorker and well dug out
Clark to Tamim, no run hit straight to cover
Clark to Tamim, no run this is turning out to be a good over from Clark, good length on off and he defends it
Clark to Tamim, 1 run goes for the drive, and it takes the outside edge and runs away to third man
Clark to Ashraful, no run slower ball, back of a length, on off and he defends it square on the off

Johnson to Tamim, OUT Tamim falls, holing out to third man, that was short of a length but there wasn't enough room to cut. Tamim went for the cut anyway, but didn't get hold of it and Brett Geeves takes a fine catch at third man
Johnson to Raqibul, no run short, quick delivery on middle, batsmen watches it sail through to the keeper
Johnson to Raqibul, no run just outside off and the batsman is beaten
Johnson to Raqibul, no run shortish, angling away from the right hander and he lets it go to the keeper
Johnson to Raqibul, no run similar delivery but slightly wider, the batsman isn't tempted to go for a shot
Johnson to Raqibul, no run same length but on the stumps this time and the batsman defends it down the ground
Clark to Ashraful, 1 run Clark gets the outside edge again, and it flies to backward point
Clark to Raqibul, 1 run back of a length, on off, and worked away towards square leg
Clark to Ashraful, no run full delivery, on the stumps, defended
Clark to Ashraful, no run shorter this time, on off, Ashraful walks across and defends it to the on side
Clark to Ashraful, 1 run runs it down to third man
Clark to Raqibul, 2 runs short ball on middle, pulled to midwicket, direct hit from Mitchell Johnson and the batsmen take another run off the richochet
Johnson to Ashraful, no run tempts him with width outside off and Ashraful nearly falls for the bait, withdraws the cut

Johnson to Ashraful, OUT plumb in front and Bangladesh sink deeper, Johnson bangs it in back of a length and Ashraful eyes the deep square leg boundary, unfortunately he misjudges the lower bounce and is trapped right in front of middle, Peter
Johnson to Shakib, no run bangs it in short outside off and Shakib lets that fizz past him
Johnson to Shakib, 1 run gets it tn angle in to the left hander and Shakib turns the face of the bat and clips it wide of midwicket for a single
Johnson to Raqibul, no run gets a bit of width outside off but fails to execute the drive properly as he mistimes it to the off side
Johnson to Raqibul, 1 run Raqibul taps it wide of the bowler with soft hands, calls quickly and sets off for a single, good running
Clarke to Raqibul, 1 run comes round the wicket, floats it around leg stump, he gets on his knee and paddles it to fine leg
Clarke to Shakib, no run stays on the back foot, waits for the turn and clips it to midwicket
Clarke to Shakib, no run takes a couple of paces down the track but checks his shot to point
Clarke to Shakib, no run waits patiently at the crease and softly taps it down to the on side
Clarke to Shakib, no run flighted outside off, he taps it down to point
Clarke to Shakib, no run flighted on middle and off, he gets behind the line and defends back to the bowler
Johnson to Raqibul, no run Raqibul pushes it towards Clarke at backward point but turns down the single
Johnson to Raqibul, no run plays very close to the body as he clips it away behind square on the on side
Johnson to Raqibul, no run gets a nasty lifter from Johnson that kicks up off a good length and raps him on the gloves, he fends it off pretty well in the end

Johnson to Raqibul, no run Appeal Johnson gets some steep bounce down the leg side and it appeared as if the ball clipped something before reaching Haddin, Parker shakes his head, replays showed the ball hitting the shirt
Johnson to Raqibul, 1 run hits a good length outside off, he pushes it towards cover
Johnson to Shakib, 1 run strays towards the body and Shakib works it past the keeper to keep the strike

Clarke to Shakib, FOUR runs risky but Bangladesh will take it, Shakib steps down the track to a flighted delivery and just clears Geeves' reach at mid-on, Geeves was a couple of yards in front of the circle
Clarke to Shakib, no run goes for a wild slog sweep and misses it completely
Clarke to Shakib, 1 run Shakib refuses to back down as he attempts a pull this time and mistimes it to the on side
Clarke to Raqibul, no run flighted outside off, he pushes it down to the off side
Clarke to Raqibul, 1 run flighted outside off, he gets forward and pushes it down to long-off

Clarke to Shakib, OUT he had it coming, Shakib steps down the track to cart Clarke over long-on but makes a mess of a low full toss, he turns the face of the bat too early and the leading edge lobs to Stuart Clark at mid-off
Johnson to Raqibul, no run pitches outside off, he shoulders arms
Johnson to Raqibul, 1 run pitches outside off, he taps it down to the off side
Johnson to Kapali, 1 run hits a good length outside off, he gets off the mark with a tap down to point
Johnson to Raqibul, no run softens him up with a bouncer that sails past his helmet, he sways away at the right moment
Johnson to Raqibul, no run bangs it in short and tempts him to go for the slash over third man, not too far from the edge
Johnson to Raqibul, no run the slower ball this time, he drives and gets an outside edge to the slips
Clark to Kapali, no run swings it in to the right hander and he whips it to mid-on
Clark to Kapali, no run hits a good length outside off, he pushes it down to point

Clark to Kapali, FOUR runs lovely shot, that was fractionally short of a length outside off, Kapali got his elbows high and punched it wide of the packed off side field down to the deep extra cover boundary
Clark to Kapali, 1 run drifts in to him and he turns it to wide mid-on
Clark to Raqibul, no run pitches outside off and holds its line, he shoulders arms
Clark to Raqibul, no run pitches outside the off stumps and seams away, he shoulders arms
Geeves to Kapali, no run hits a nice length outside the off stump, he gets behind the line and defends
Geeves to Kapali, no run hits the same length around the off stump and gets this one to drift in a little, defended on the back foot
Geeves to Kapali, no run generates a lot more pace and bounce, he goes for the upper cut but misses

Geeves to Kapali, FOUR runs back of a length, punched off the back foot and timed superbly, the placement is good enough to beat cover, Clarke pulls it back before the rope but the ball rolls back and hits it
Geeves to Kapali, no run good length outside off, pushed to the off side
Geeves to Kapali, no run short and slightly wide outside off, Kapali nearly falls for the bait again, this is the second upper cut that has failed to make contact in this over
Clark to Raqibul, no run hits a good length on middle and leg, he turns it to the on side
Clark to Raqibul, no run hits a good length on middle and leg, he gets behind the line and defends
Clark to Raqibul, 1 wide drifts wide outside off, he thinks of chasing it but changes his mind
Clark to Raqibul, no run hits a good length outside off, keeps a little low before reaching the keeper
Clark to Raqibul, no run pitches outside off, he drives to mid-off
Clark to Raqibul, no run slides towards the pads, he clips it away to square leg
Clark to Raqibul, no run cuts the pace off the ball and he turns it to midwicket this time
Geeves to Kapali, no run Geeves persists with the short of length delivery which kicks up, Haddin has to leap to collect that
Geeves to Kapali, no run and this one shoots through low outside off, two-paced surface this, luckily it didn't cost Kapali his wicket
Geeves to Kapali, no run fuller in length and angled down to point
Geeves to Kapali, no run full outside off, he shapes to drive through the covers but gets an inside edge to the on side
Geeves to Kapali, no run hits a good length outside off and gets it to nip back in, he gets behind the line and taps it away
Geeves to Kapali, 2 runs gives him just a bit of width outside off and he executes the punched drive well, beats mid-off
Bracken to Raqibul, no run Haddin stands up to the stumps, Raqibul gets forward to a full delivery and pushes it to the off side

Bracken to Raqibul, OUT a direct hit sends him packing, Raqibul lunged forward and chips it in the air towards mid-on, there are cries for a catch but the ball falls well short, the batsmen set off for a run that should never have been taken, K
Bracken to Dhiman, no run gets across the right hander, he lets it go
Bracken to Dhiman, no run hits a good length outside off, he lets it go
Bracken to Dhiman, no run full and wide outside off, he chips it uppishly towards point
Bracken to Dhiman, no run hits a good length outside off, he punches it down to mid-off
Geeves to Raqibul, no run gives him a bit of width outside off, he plays a punchy drive towards cover
Geeves to Raqibul, no run tries to bounce him out outside the off stump, he shoulders arms
Geeves to Raqibul, no run pitches outside off and this keeps a little low, he shoulders arms
Geeves to Raqibul, 2 runs gets forward and drives uppishly down to extra cover
Geeves to Raqibul, no run good length outside off, pushed back to the bowler
Geeves to Raqibul, 1 run drifts towards the body, he nudges it with the angle down to fine leg
Bracken to Raqibul, no run pitches outside off and holds its line, punched to the off side
Bracken to Raqibul, 1 run the off cutter, he stays at the crease and the outside edge runs down to third man
Bracken to Dhiman, no run stays at the crease and steers it down to point
Bracken to Dhiman, no run good length outside off, cramps him for room and he settles to defend this on the back foot
Bracken to Dhiman, 1 run sees the width and slashes it just over the reach of gully, risky shot
Bracken to Raqibul, no run another slower ball, he plays the cover drive too early and the ball nearly takes the outside edge
Geeves to Dhiman, OUT First wicket in international cricket for Brett Geeves. Shortish delivery but excellent line just outside off and Dhiman Ghosh fishes at it giving Haddin a simple catch
Geeves to Razzak, 1 run short ball aimed at the Razzak's body. He manages to get it away to the leg side
Geeves to Raqibul, no run tight line outside off, left alone by the batsman
Geeves to Raqibul, no run shorter this time but same line, Raqibul jumps and defends it
Geeves to Raqibul, no run on the stumps this time, defended back to the bowler
Geeves to Raqibul, no run yorker on middle, Raqibul just about manages to dig it out
Bracken to Razzak, no run back of a length, slightly wide outside off, Razzak pokes at it and is beaten
Bracken to Razzak, no run fuller delivery, just outside off, Razzak punches it to the leg side
Bracken to Razzak, 1 run Dropped! slower delivery, length and and a little wide outside off, Razzak tries to smash it to the leg side and David Hussey misses a difficult chance
Bracken to Raqibul, 2 runs bit of room outside off and dabbed down to third man
Bracken to Raqibul, no run
Bracken to Raqibul, no run slower ball, on a length angling across the right hander, defended by the batman square on the off
Geeves to Razzak, no run good length, outside off and left alone
Geeves to Razzak, 1 run full delivery this time, hit towards cover
Geeves to Raqibul, no run attempted drive, mistimed to the leg side
Geeves to Raqibul, OUT Another wicket for Geeves. Short and lifting towards Raqibul's helmet. He tries to fend it off, it takes the shoulder of the bat and flies to David Hussey at second slip
Geeves to Mortaza, no run superb yorker on off first up, the batsman manages to survive though
Geeves to Mortaza, no run shortish and outside off, Mortaza sways exaggeratedly out of the way
White to Razzak, no run Cameron White tosses it up, flicked to midwicket
White to Razzak, 1 run tossed up again, worked away to short fine leg
White to Mortaza, 2 runs
White to Mortaza, no run good line and length, driven firmly back and White makes a superb diving stop
White to Mortaza, 1 run flighted again, bit of width, driven to cover
Johnson to Mortaza, 1 run short and the batsman gives himself and fends it away through the vacant fourth slip region
Johnson to Nazmul, no run quick, outside off and the batsman is beaten
Johnson to Nazmul, no run on a length, bit of width, gets the edge but bounces before reaching Haddin, who makes a collects it well
Johnson to Nazmul, no run pushed to cover
Johnson to Nazmul, no run on middle and off, again pushed to the off side, no run.
Johnson to Nazmul, no run slips in the bouncer to finish the over. The batsman sees that coming and gets out of the way well in time
White to Mortaza, 1 run back of a length, cut to cover
White to Shahadat, no run on the leg stump and he is hit on the pads

White to Shahadat, OUT White gets three as Bangladesh slump to their lowest score ever. Shortish delivery outside off, tried to cut it, gets the bottom edge, ricochets off Haddin's thigh and Clarke dives forward from first slip to snaffle it in
Thanks for joining us. We hope you enjoyed our coverage. Do join us for the next match on Wednesday, September 3rd
Michael Hussey is named Man of the Match for his superbly paced 85.
Clarke is full of praise for the energy in the field and from the bowlers. He is also thrilled with the way the new boys like Brett Geeves and Shaun Marsh have stepped up.

Another good day's work for Australia. Another demoralising loss for Bangladesh. The visitors' bowlers did an acceptable job but the batting was woeful and the old problems of going for their shots too early persists.
Australia won by 180 runs
Player of the match is Michael Hussey, AUS
